alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Big Horn, southeastern Musselshell and central Yellowstone Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 448 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from 18 miles north of Worden to 11 miles north of Pryor. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Billings, Lockwood, Shepherd, Huntley, Worden, Ballantine and Pompeys Pillar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seeking shelter inside a building if storms approach.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
